SELECT
,
FROM tb_culpro_hosp ORDER BY itemUpdateAt DESC

select
,
from tb_culpro_hosp WHERE HOSPITAL_NAME LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR HOSPITAL_LEVEL LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR HOSPITAL_ADDRESS_CITY LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR HOSPITAL_ADDRESS_COUNTRY LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR HOSPITAL_ADDRESS LIKE "%"#{value}"%" ORDER BY itemUpdateAt DESC
